title: CAREER IMPACT
content: Graduates of PTDI-STTD have promising career prospects in the land transportation sector, especially in the management, planning, and operation of public transportation systems. Study programs focusing on mastering modern technology, innovation, and strategic marketing prepare graduates to become adaptive and competent leaders. Many graduates have secured key positions in ministries, state-owned enterprises, and private transportation companies at both national and international levels. With a wide network and relevant skills, PTDI-STTD graduates can make significant contributions to the development of sustainable transportation systems while enhancing the competitiveness of Indonesia's land transportation industry in the globalization era.
